channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux

item.title: CVE-2022-34673|2024-08-03T09:15:15.694Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20gpu%20display%20driver%20for%20linux
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvidia.ko), where an out-of-bounds array access may lead to denial of service, information disclosure, or data tampering.
